text: The 30th TVyNovelas Awards, is an Academy of special awards to the best of soap operas and TV shows. The awards ceremony took place on February 24, 2012 in the Forum Mundo Imperial, Acapulco, Guerrero. The ceremony was televised in the Mexico by Canal de las estrellas. Jacqueline Bracamontes, Alan Tacher and Ximena Navarrete hosted the show. La fuerza del destino won 5 awards including Best Telenovela of the Year, the most for the evening. Other winners Una familia con suerte won 4 awards, Triunfo del amor won 3 awards, La que no podía amar won 2 awards and Esperanza del corazón and Ni contigo ni sin ti won one each. == Summary of awards and nominations == {| class="wikitable sortable" style="margin:1em auto;" ! style="background-color:#EEDD82;" | Telenovela !! style="background-color:#EEDD82;" | Nominations !! style="background-color:#EEDD82;" | Awards |- |Amorcito corazón ||3||0 |- |Dos hogares ||8||0 |- |Esperanza del corazón ||8||1 |- |La fuerza del destino ||8||5 |- |La que no podía amar ||7||2 |- |Ni contigo ni sin ti ||3||1 |- |Rafaela ||3||0 |- |Triunfo del amor ||9||3 |- |Una familia con suerte ||11||4 |} == Winners and nominees == === Novelas === Sandra Echeverría, Winner for Best Actress. César Évora, Winner for Best Leading Actor. Alejandra Guzmán, Winner for Best Musical Theme. Don Francisco, Awarded with Special Award for 50 years in Television.
